products.name: Dark Red Belgium Double Crepe Dress
products.brandedName: Emilia Wickstead Dark Red Belgium Double Crepe Dress
products.unbrandedName: Dark Red Belgium Double Crepe Dress
products.description: Established in 2008, the designer ready-to-wear label Emilia Wickstead has become the epitome of modern femininity. Known for her modern silhouettes and strong use of color, the techniques she utilizes serve to create clothes that effortlessly combine traditional with contemporary with an insistence on quality and a clear point of distinction. The Dark Red Belgium Double Crepe Dress is cut to a flattering fit that lends itself to a multitude of occasions. This long sleeve dress in a timeless ruby hue, features gathered detail across the neckline and is nipped in at the waist to accentuate the figure. Gentle gathers through the skirt add volume and balance out the silhouette to create a feminine silhouette. Whether you're attending a romantic date night, a cocktail party, or a formal event, this dress is a perfect choice. Mock neckline Long sleeves Gathered neckline Hidden zip closure Pleated skirt Fit-and-flare silhouette Midi length Double crepe fabric Lined Material: 95% Polyester, 5% Elastane (outer), 100% Polyester (lining) Care: Dry clean only Made in the UK

Puff sleeves with tulle-padded shoulders and ruched elastic cuffs. Chiffon fabric with metallic. ASTR-WD474. ACDR101959. Taking inspiration from the latest trends and affinity for all things feminine, the creative collective behind ASTR the Label aims to immerse their customers into a world of effortless beauty. Since 2012, the brand has stood as a wearable interpretation of attainable style for all occasions. Featuring distinctive looks that exude romance, ASTR the Label offers collections that are recognized for their quality and unique combination of contemporary sophistication, versatility and chic design. By catering to the fashion needs of the ASTRBabe, our collections continually feature on-trend and thoughtfully crafted garments for the modern woman.
